titles.title: Rural Exemption Enhancement Act of 2001

To establish a separate process for State commission evaluation of rural and small telephone company exemptions, suspensions, and modifications, with respect to advanced telecommunications capabilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 10/16/2001--Introduced. Rural Exemption Enhancement Act of 2001 - Amends the Communication Act of 1934 to establish a separate process for State commission evaluation of rural and small telephone company exemptions, suspensions, or modifications for advanced telecommunication capabilities (as opposed to voice telecommunications services).
